Description: Bed number from which plant was sampled
Date of sampling expressed as month, day, and year (MM.DD.YY)
Latitude of bed, in decimal degrees
Longitude of bed, in decimal degrees
Weight of the stipe and blades, in kilograms
Stipe length from the tip to the end, in meters
Presence of a growing tip: yes or no
Level of erosion: none, light, moderate, heavy
